title: How to Beat the Star Destroyer Mini Game in Star Wars the Force Unleashed

steps.headline: Take out all TIE fighters.
steps.description: The quickest way to do this is to jump and use force lightning. The fighters will alternate between attacking from the left and from the right.

steps.headline: Use the force grip button and "grab" the Star Destroyer.
steps.description: You must position it so the front of it is aimed directly at you.

steps.headline: Hold it in place until Rahm Kota tells you to pull it out of the sky.
Repeat these same steps until you win.

text: Take out all TIE fighters. The quickest way to do this is to jump and use force lightning. The fighters will alternate between attacking from the left and from the right. Use the force grip button and "grab" the Star Destroyer. You must position it so the front of it is aimed directly at you. Hold it in place until Rahm Kota tells you to pull it out of the sky.  Repeat these same steps until you win.
